typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		statecode as string,
		ntt_referencenumber as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_triggercreditorsubmitnotification as string,
		ntt_creditorexternalreferenceid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		ntt_triggernotification as string,
		ntt_debttypeid as string,
		transactioncurrencyid as string,
		ntt_activeregister as string,
		exchangerate as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		ntt_amount_base as string,
		statuscode as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		ntt_breathingspacedebtid as string,
		ntt_triggercreditorexpirynotification as string,
		ntt_amount as string,
		createdby as string,
		ntt_debtstatusid as string,
		ntt_creditorid as string,
		ntt_breathingspacemoratoriumid as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		owninguser as string,
		ntt_nationalinsurancenumber as string,
		modifiedonbehalfby as string,
		ntt_commencementdate as string,
		timezoneruleversionnumber as string,
		ntt_expirydate as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		ntt_previouslysold as string,
		ntt_otherdebttype as string,
		ntt_activeregisterperiodenddate as string,
		ntt_retentionperiodenddate as string,
		ntt_retentionperiodstartdate as string,
		ntt_activeregisterperiodstartdate as string,
		ntt_removedfromregisterdate as string,
		ntt_removaldate as string,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtId as string,
		blNTTActiveRegister as boolean,
		dcNTTAmount as decimal(38,4),
		strNTTBreathingSpaceMoratoriumId as string,
		strNTTCreditorId as string,
		strNTTDebtTypeId as string,
		tsNTTCommencementDate as timestamp,
		tsNTTActiveRegisterPeriodStartDate as timestamp,
		tsNTTRemovedFromRegisterDate as timestamp,
		tsNTTRemovalDate as timestamp,
		blIsTruncate as boolean,
		steNTTCreditorId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceValidation
sourceValidation select(mapColumn(
		statecode,
		ntt_referencenumber,
		createdon,
		ntt_triggercreditorsubmitnotification,
		ntt_creditorexternalreferenceid,
		ownerid,
		modifiedon,
		ntt_triggernotification,
		ntt_debttypeid,
		transactioncurrencyid,
		ntt_activeregister,
		exchangerate,
		modifiedby,
		ntt_amount_base,
		statuscode,
		owningbusinessunit,
		ntt_breathingspacedebtid,
		ntt_triggercreditorexpirynotification,
		ntt_amount,
		createdby,
		ntt_debtstatusid,
		ntt_creditorid,
		ntt_breathingspacemoratoriumid,
		ntt_name,
		owninguser,
		ntt_nationalinsurancenumber,
		modifiedonbehalfby,
		ntt_commencementdate,
		timezoneruleversionnumber,
		ntt_expirydate,
		intBatchId,
		partdist,
		ntt_previouslysold,
		ntt_otherdebttype,
		ntt_retentionperiodenddate,
		ntt_retentionperiodstartdate,
		ntt_activeregisterperiodstartdate,
		ntt_activeregisterperiodenddate,
		blIsValid,
		tsCreatedOn,
		tsModifiedOn,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtId,
		blNTTActiveRegister,
		dcNTTAmount,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceMoratoriumId,
		strNTTCreditorId,
		strNTTDebtTypeId,
		tsNTTCommencementDate,
		tsNTTActiveRegisterPeriodStartDate,
		tsNTTRemovedFromRegisterDate,
		blIsTruncate,
		steNTTCreditorId,
		ntt_removedfromregisterdate,
		ntt_removaldate,
		tsNTTRemovalDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowSink
AlterRowSink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/moratoriums/breathingspacedebt',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtId'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partdist
	)) ~> sinkODS
